data.message: Hi, question please, I'm failing to edit/change my hometown on timeline seems like the option is not functioning anymore, was wondering if you someone could kindly help me out on this issue, thanks!

replies.message: Hi Ahmed. You can learn more about how to edit basic personal information on your profile here: http://on.fb.me/1QpKg6n . -Nancy
Facebook, Hi, still the same, I can edit everything BUT the hometown there's no option/edit next to "Hometown"!

Its not working out for me at all, I've tried repeatedly but the "Hometown" option is not working for me, in fact its not responding to the click or to be chosen as if the option "Hometown" is not there!
